trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Frisco
There were no other sightings in Frisco on or around January 19th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving to work this morning, I noticed a very bright object in the ese sky, just left of Scorpio. It was so bright that it appeared close. I figured that I may overtake it before I had driven 30 miles. This never happened. So my next thought was that it was Venus. Upon arriving at my destination, I pulled up the Sky and Telescope website and the interactive sky chart. I plugged in the time of sighting and rotated to the location. Sure enough it was Venus. The relationship of the Sun, Venus and the Earth made for a beautiful observation. In fact you could still see it after the Sun rose. I was disappointed that it wasnt an UFO, I sighted one in 1989, but thrilled at the picturesque scene our solar system has to offer.
Summary: Venus Bright in the southeast sky
